title: Total Annihilation (2008 Bugfix Pack - FULL)
description:
Total Annihilation (by Cavedog Entertainment.)



Voted the greatest RTS game of all time. We must agree.

This unique TA-Bugfix pack includes:

Total Annihilation, TA:CC, TA:BT, NO-CD fix, +5000 unit patch, all bonus units, UI enhancements, recorder/replayer, selection of most popular maps, the official Switeck Bugfix patch + OTA switcher and many many more features!

By far the best TA torrent online. We have managed to compress it into a tiny file by skipping unpopular maps and single player missions (can be downloaded separately). You&#039;ll only ever need this TA torrent! See our community website at for more info or how to play online with us.

Sincerely, enjoy!
